title: Longest Badges (I've had mine for 2 years)
body:
Just putting this out there for everyone, wondering what has been the longest time period that some one has held a badge for

Teamwork
Helpful
Friendly
Honorable Opponent
Leadership

Cause i have had my Teamwork badge for over 2 years now with out it being taken away.
I've told a riot support staff member and he has suggested to me to bring it to the boards and get others word about this.

replies.body: I've had every single on at one point or another but I've had the teamwork for as long as I can remember

Teamwork since season 3

honorable opponent since season 5

The only way to get those badges is being premade. I have regular games where I am friendly, or have good teamwork and leadership and whatever, but and do get honoured, but not regular enough. Playing with solo players all they care about are themselves.
I have had the leadership badge since i was about level 15
Had the green badge thing for as long as I can remember

'Friendly'
I've had it ever since the badges came out
